docs.snippet: Recent actions by a billionaire owner of a National Basketball Association team and a supporter of a Spanish soccer club have offered the sporting world a stark reminder that racism knows no borders....
docs.lead_paragraph: Recent actions by a billionaire owner of a National Basketball Association team and a supporter of a Spanish soccer club have offered the sporting world a stark reminder that racism knows no borders.

docs.snippet: Heisman Trophy winner Jameis Winston was issued a civil citation after sheriff's deputies said he walked out of a supermarket without paying for $32 worth of crab legs and crawfish....
docs.lead_paragraph: Heisman Trophy winner Jameis Winston was issued a civil citation after sheriff's deputies said he walked out of a supermarket without paying for $32 worth of crab legs and crawfish.

headline.main: Heisman Winner Winston Accused of Taking Crab Legs
headline.print_headline: Heisman Winner Winston Accused of Taking Crab Legs

docs.snippet: Mr. President, a singles hitter doesn’t scare anybody....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. President, a singles hitter doesn’t scare anybody.
docs.abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column takes Pres Obama to task for his press conference alongside Philippines Pres Benigno Aquino III, in which Obama complained about criticism of his leadership in foreign policy; accuses Obama of seeming adrift and disconnected, even as the world faces crises like one involving Russia and Ukraine.

docs.snippet: Less than three months into his job as the new commissioner of the National Basketball Association (NBA), Adam Silver has already left an indelible impression on the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Less than three months into his job as the new commissioner of the National Basketball Association (NBA), Adam Silver has already left an indelible impression on the game.

headline.main: Commissioner Silver Passes Test With Decisive Clippers Action
headline.print_headline: Commissioner Silver Passes Test With Decisive Clippers Action

docs.snippet: The ability to bar Donald Sterling is not in question, but the league might not find it is simple to terminate his ownership....
docs.lead_paragraph: The ability to bar Donald Sterling is not in question, but the league might not find it is simple to terminate his ownership.
docs.abstract: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver's authority to ban and fine Los Angeles Clippers owner David Sterling is largely unquestioned, but his ability to force sale of team remains murkier; list of causes in league's constitution that would prompt termination of ownership do not specifically include making racist or incendiary remarks.

headline.main: Commissioner Sees Basis for Ousting Clippers’ Owner

docs.snippet: Several luminaries from sports and show business, Oprah Winfrey among them, signaled interest on Wednesday in buying the Los Angeles Clippers as the NBA set a first meeting to weigh removing Donald Sterling as owner over racist remarks attributed ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Several luminaries from sports and show business, Oprah Winfrey among them, signaled interest on Wednesday in buying the Los Angeles Clippers as the NBA set a first meeting to weigh removing Donald Sterling as owner over racist remarks attributed to him.

headline.main: NBA Sets Wheels Turning for Clippers Sale; Oprah in Wings
headline.print_headline: NBA Sets Wheels Turning for Clippers Sale; Oprah in Wings

docs.snippet: Adam Silver, the league’s commissioner, also said he would try to force Donald Sterling to sell the team in the aftermath of racist remarks by Sterling that became public....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adam Silver, the league’s commissioner, also said he would try to force Donald Sterling to sell the team in the aftermath of racist remarks by Sterling that became public.
docs.abstract: National Basketball Association hands lifetime ban to longtime Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling; ban, an extraordinary step in professional sports, is intended to rid the league of Sterling after he was recorded making racist comments; Commissioner Adam Silver says NBA will try to force Sterling to sell the team.

headline.main: N.B.A. Bars Clippers Owner Donald Sterling for Life
headline.print_headline: Clippers Owner Barred for Life Over Racist Talk
